items.sentence: Tom says that he hopes Mary doesn't do that.
Tom should've bought the more expensive one.
You knew that Tom would do that, didn't you?
You knew that Tom was a butcher, didn't you?
You don't think that Tom is a crook, do you?
You and I both know that Tom has to do that.
You don't think Tom really did that, do you?
You and Tom will travel together, won't you?
You and Tom didn't travel together, did you?
You'll learn how to do that sooner or later.
You wouldn't do that by yourself, would you?
You won't be allowed to do that by yourself.
You swore that you wouldn't do that anymore.
You still don't think I can do that, do you?
You should do that more carefully next time.
You might get fired if you do that that way.
You looked like you were through doing that.
You looked like you were tempted to do that.
You don't need to know why I didn't do that.
You don't know why I didn't do that, do you?
